name: Simply the Basics
description: Simply the Basics is a nonprofit Hygiene Bank. The Mission of Simply the Basics is to provide people and communities their most basic needs for health and wellness. Services include hygiene distribution to the community, partnerships with nonprofits to provide hygiene and sanitation, and ongoing hygiene care to families and people in need.
